DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I/Ib trial study absorption metabolism phytochemical find black raspberry men undergo surgery prostate cancer . This knowledge help u design future chemoprevention study assist make future dietary recommendation men high risk prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Aborption Metabolism Lyophilized Black Raspberry Food Products Men With Prostate Cancer Undergoing Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To conduct dose-escalation study determine safety compliance vary lyophilized black raspberry ( LBR ) delivery vehicle ( gummy confection nectar ) two different dos . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To precisely quantify change content distribution black raspberry phytochemical metabolites blood urine correlate concentration prostate tissue phytochemical . II . Measure ability black raspberry gummy confection nectar alter hormonal pattern ( low insulin-like growth factor-1 [ IGF-I ] , high insulin-like growth factor-binding protein 3 [ IGF-BP3 ] , low androgen ) consistent reduce prostate carcinogenesis parallel enhance capacity quench reactive oxygen . III . Investigate histopathologic , immunologic , molecular biomarkers associate prostate carcinogenesis may serve surrogate endpoint biomarkers provide information regard ability modulate black raspberry . IV . Determine consumption black raspberries alters molecular marker human prostate include : ( ) neuroendocrine marker IGF-I IGF-BP3 , ( b ) signal transduction marker phosphatase tensin homologue ( PTEN ) phospho-AKT , ( c ) angiogenesis regulator ( vascular epithelial growth factor ( VEGF ) . V. Collect store plasma peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) patient assess systemic marker inflammation immune response . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study lyophilize black raspberry gummy confection nectar . Patients assign 1 7 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients follow regular diet 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM II : Patients follow low polyphenol diet 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM III : Patients follow low ellagitannin diet 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM IV : Patients follow low ellagitannin diet receive lower-dose black raspberry gummy orally ( PO ) daily 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM V : Patients follow low ellagitannin diet receive higher-dose black raspberry gummy PO daily 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM VI : Patients follow low ellagitannin diet receive lower-dose black raspberry nectar PO daily 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy . ARM VII : Patients follow low ellagitannin diet receive higher-dose black raspberry nectar PO daily 4-6 week undergo prostatectomy .
DOC.criteria: Have biopsy prove carcinoma prostate Have choose radical prostatectomy treatment disease medical team present possible treatment option Not receive neoadjuvant hormonal chemotherapy ( clinical trial ) Have Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 01 Not currently take berry dietary supplement , `` alternative '' product ( Acai berry , pomegranate , black raspberry , Optiberry , Juice Plus ) Have BUN/Cr ( blood urea nitrogen serum creatinine ) within normal limit Have liver enzymes within normal limit Have complete blood count ( CBC ) within normal limit Have prothrombin time/partial thromboplastin time ( PT/PTT/INR ) within normal limit Voluntarily agree participate sign inform consent document Agree prostate biopsy block provide study evaluation Agree consume standardize vitamin mineral supplement avoid nutrition , dietary , alternative medications/supplements duration study Agree follow control polyphenolic and/ ellagitannin diet Have active malignancy prostate cancer require therapy Have prostate biopsy le 5 % cancer involvement Have history traumatic surgical castration Have history pituitary hormone diseases currently require supplemental hormonal administration ( thyroid hormone , adrenocorticotropic hormone [ ACTH ] , growth hormone ) endocrine disorder require hormone administration exception diabetes osteoporosis Are take certain medication ; concurrent finasteride ( Proscar ) hormonal agent chemoprevention/treatment benign prostate hyperplasia ( BPH ) ; utilize prescription medication urinary outlet obstructive symptom permit ; use nonprescription substance improve urinary tract symptom permit ( i.e . Saw Palmetto , herbal , alternative product ) Have know allergy black raspberry , corn , wheat product never consume product Have active metabolic digestive illness malabsorptive disorder ( Crohn 's , Celiac disease , irritable bowel syndrome [ IBS ] ) , renal insufficiency , hepatic insufficiency , cachexia , short bowel syndrome Have significant loss gastrointestinal organ due surgery , except appendix Have alter immunity autoimmune disorder , cancer , anemia , hemophilia , blood dyscrasia Have noticeable open lesion oral cavity , sores heal 2 month history leukoplakia , tumor buccal cavity , throat , lip Have difficulty swallowing ( dysphagia ) , pain swallow ( odynophagia ) , salivary gland dysfunction , xerostomia ( dry mouth ) Are take medication inhibit clotting ( warfarin sodium ) use prescribed oral rinse ( Peridex )
